system.name: Researcher
system.effect: Choose two Researcher Fields of Study. You may take Features from those Fields with this instance of Researcher. Gain one Feature from a chosen Researcher Field for which you qualify. Note: Researcher is broken up into multiple Fields of Study. You may not take Features from a Field of Study you havenâ€™t chosen with the base Researcher Feature. You may take Researcher any number of times, each time choosing two different Fields of Study.
system.prerequisites: An Education Skill at Novice Rank
